alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:52AM CDT until April 21 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 25.5 feet. - Forecast...The creek will fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 25.5 Wed 9 am CDT 23.0 17.5 16.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
